title: Zurueck zum Glueck
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The English translation of the name of the restaurant is Return to Happiness. Offers several vegan options including salads, a breakfast, and a burger, which are clearly marked on menu. All coffee specialties are available with soy milk varieties. Nice place to hang out. Good location, terrace seating.
